resource.name: Assemble all needed materials for immunization session
resource.description: *Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Assemble all needed materials for immunization session: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to provide a immunization session materials checklist, which is a list of materials I would need for immunization session so that >I can make sure I have the materials I need for immunization session

resource.name: Capture or update client history
resource.description: *Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Capture or update client history: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to provide a history of previous care (including previous vaccination records) so that >I have access and review client's history

resource.name: Capture or update client history
resource.description: *Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Capture or update client history: As a Health worker, I want to: >To add client's health history (including previous vaccination records) so that >I can appropriately determine which vaccinations are required

resource.name: Check stock availability of recommended vaccines
resource.description: *Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Check stock availability of recommended vaccines: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to display stock availability of recommended vaccines so that >I can check if the vaccines are available

resource.name: Check stock availability of recommended vaccines
resource.description: *Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Check stock availability of recommended vaccines: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to warn if required vaccine is not in stock so that >I can alert the client if the vaccine is not available

resource.name: Check stock availability of recommended vaccines
resource.description: *Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Check stock availability of recommended vaccines: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to display the expiry date of stock to ensure expired vaccines are not administered so that >I give safe and effective doses only

resource.name: Create client record
resource.description: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Create client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to enforce a minimal required data set for new registrations so that >Sufficient data is entered to be able to identify the client

resource.name: Create client record
resource.description: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Create client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to uniquely identify every client using a system generated unique identifier or an existing identifier (e.g. health care, national ID, health unique ID) so that >The client can be definitively identified using that number

resource.name: Create client record
resource.description: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Create client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to generate a unique identifier so that >The client can be uniquely identified for vaccination activities across systems using the same ID

resource.name: Create client record
resource.description: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Create client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >Validate a unique identifier when system is offline so that >Entry errors are prevented

resource.name: Create/update vaccination location record
resource.description: *Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Create/update vaccination location record: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to be able to update vaccination location information so that >We have a complete vaccination location record

resource.name: Define parameters for report
resource.description: *Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Define parameters for report: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to configure report parameters when creating new reports (period of time, inactive versus active clients, client's age, vaccine type, vaccine manufacturer, etc.) so that >Appropriate reports can be generated

resource.name: Define parameters for report
resource.description: *Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Define parameters for report: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to select report parameters when creating vaccination coverage reports (i.e. by vaccine, by dose, by age, by area, by condition, by vaccine manufacturer, etc) so that >Appropriate vaccination coverage reports can be generated

resource.name: Define parameters for report
resource.description: *Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Define parameters for report: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to customize report parameters for error monitoring reports so that >I can generate reports specific to my needs and the nature of potential programmatic errors I want to monitor

resource.name: Define parameters for report
resource.description: *Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Define parameters for report: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to select what information a report shows (i.e. display options, summary versus detail report, sort options) so that >The report presentation can be customised

resource.name: Define parameters for report
resource.description: *Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Define parameters for report: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to schedule routine reports (specific date/time, daily, weekly, etc.) so that >The reports can be generated automatically and are available at the right time

resource.name: Define/evaluate criteria
resource.description: *Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Define/evaluate criteria: As a Health worker, I want to: >To select reminder parameters. May include but not limited to, age range, vaccine type(s), vaccine schedules, geographic area, number of days overdue, number of reminders, etc. so that >Reminders can be optimized

resource.name: Define/evaluate criteria
resource.description: *Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Define/evaluate criteria: As a Health worker, I want to: >To associate a client with a vaccination location to generate a provider-based reminder/recall so that >Vaccination location specific lists of clients can be generated

resource.name: Define/evaluate criteria
resource.description: *Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Define/evaluate criteria: As a Health worker, I want to: >To validate data against the vaccine schedule (Note: Can use the vaccine schedule to best schedule reminders/recall for series vaccinations) so that >The generated list adheres to guidelines

resource.name: Design software security protections to ensure system availability
resource.description:
*Category*: Confidentiality, privacy and security
Design software security protections to ensure system availability

resource.name: Determine if vaccines were missed
resource.description: *Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Determine if vaccines were missed: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to flag a client as a defaulter after a configured number of reminders are sent so that >We can identify those who have not come and are overdue, requiring additional intervention

resource.name: Determine if vaccines were missed
resource.description: *Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Determine if vaccines were missed: As a Health worker, I want to: >To specify thresholds for a client to qualify as requiring follow-up, based on the national immunization guidelines so that >Follow up is only done at the appropriate time

resource.name: Determine required vaccination(s)
resource.description: *Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Determine required vaccination(s): As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to display vaccines due according to predefined vaccine protocol so that >I can assess which vaccines need to be administered

resource.name: Determine required vaccination(s)
resource.description: *Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Determine required vaccination(s): As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to determine vaccines due for a given client by considering relevant information, such as the age of the client, vaccine products, vaccines already given and predefined vaccine protocol so that >it helps me with selecting the appropriate vaccines for the client

resource.name: Determine required vaccination(s)
resource.description: *Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Determine required vaccination(s): As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to ensure I have the most up-to-date vaccine protocols so that >It will recommend the correct schedule

resource.name: Determine time for next visit (as needed)
resource.description: *Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Determine time for next visit (as needed): As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to display due date of the next vaccine so that >I can inform the client when to return for their next vaccination

resource.name: Determine vaccine(s) to be administered based on contraindications
resource.description: *Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Determine vaccine(s) to be administered based on contraindications: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be alerted of any relevant potential contraindications for the vaccine (e.g. based on age, previous allergic reactions, etc.) so that >I can withhold the vaccine, if contraindicated

resource.name: Determine vaccine(s) to be administered based on contraindications
resource.description: *Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Determine vaccine(s) to be administered based on contraindications: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to quickly access information regarding any contraindications by antigen so that >I can access all information on contraindications in one place

resource.name: Dispose of waste
resource.description: *Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Dispose of waste: As a Health worker, I want to: >To update stock record so that >I know which stock adjustments have not been done automatically (such as in instances if something is wasted)

resource.name: Does client require a verifiable digital certificate?
resource.description: *Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Does client require a verifiable digital certificate?: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be prompted to ask client if they want a digital vaccination certificate where appropriate so that >The digital vaccination certificate can be generated

resource.name: Evaluate vaccine event records
resource.description: *Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Evaluate vaccine event records: As a EIR staff OR health worker, I want to: >To be able to manually initiate duplicates identification process so that >It can be done when the user is available to review

resource.name: Evaluate vaccine event records
resource.description: *Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Evaluate vaccine event records: As a EIR staff OR health worker, I want to: >To be able to manually flag duplicate vaccination events so that >I can report duplicates that the system was not able to identify

resource.name: Evaluate vaccine event records
resource.description: *Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Evaluate vaccine event records: As a EIR staff OR health worker, I want to: >The system to display a specific set of data related to the possible duplicated events (such as vaccine type, manufacturer, administration date, etc.) for manual review so that >I am able to perform the review

resource.name: Evaluate vaccine event records
resource.description: *Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Evaluate vaccine event records: As a EIR staff OR health worker, I want to: >To be able to view simultaneously potential duplicate records so that >I can easily compare the records and to determine if they are duplicates

resource.name: Evaluate vaccine event records
resource.description: *Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Evaluate vaccine event records: As a EIR staff OR health worker, I want to: >To be able to access the vaccination events while reviewing the duplicates so that >I can review other fields to aid in my decision-making

resource.name: Exchange actionable data between systems (need to enforce semantic interoperability)
resource.description:
*Category*: Compatibility
Exchange actionable data between systems (need to enforce semantic interoperability)

resource.name: Flag client records for evaluation
resource.description: *Business process* (G) resolve duplicate client records: Activity: Flag client records for evaluation: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to support a rules-based algorithm to evaluate duplicate records so that >Duplicates can be found by the system using pre-defined rules

resource.name: Flag client records for evaluation
resource.description: *Business process* (G) resolve duplicate client records: Activity: Flag client records for evaluation: As a EIR staff, I want to: >To be able to modify the business rules used for identifying duplicate client records so that >The de-duplication process is optimized

resource.name: Flag client records for evaluation
resource.description: *Business process* (G) resolve duplicate client records: Activity: Flag client records for evaluation: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to automatically flag client records as possible duplicates by marking them as pending for review so that >The health worker or EIR staff is informed and aware of pending review

resource.name: Focus on the mobile-user experience with secondary use of a computer

Focus on the mobile-user experience with secondary use of a computer

*Category*: General
Generate IDs that are unique across different locations or sites

resource.name: Generate list of clients
resource.description: *Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Generate list of clients: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to track the number of reminders attempts (i.e. per client and total) so that >I can know if additional action may be required, or when to stop sending reminders

resource.name: Generate list of clients
resource.description: *Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Generate list of clients: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to prevent all records given an inactive or deceased status from being included in the list of clients for reminder/recall so that >Notifications will not be inappropriately sent to clients

resource.name: Generate list of clients
resource.description: *Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Generate list of clients: As a Health worker, I want to: >to be able to generate a list of clients according to defined parameters so that >I have a list according to my needs

resource.name: Generate list of clients
resource.description: *Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Generate list of clients: As a Health worker, I want to: >To print the list of clients generated according to defined parameters so that >I can use it when I am offline

resource.name: Generate list of clients
resource.description: *Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Generate list of clients: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to log each time a user prints a list of clients so that >Printing needs can be monitored

resource.name: Generate list of clients
resource.description: *Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Generate list of clients: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to display the date the reminder/recall notice was sent to a client so that >I will know when it was sent and can follow-up accordingly

resource.name: Generate list of clients who are due or overdue for vaccination
resource.description: *Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Generate list of clients who are due or overdue for vaccination: As a Health worker, I want to: >To produce a list of clients who missed their vaccine for each antigen, along with their location and personal information so that >I can plan follow up activities and contact the clients

resource.name: Generate list of clients who are due or overdue for vaccination
resource.description: *Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Generate list of clients who are due or overdue for vaccination: As a Health worker, I want to: >To print a list of clients requiring follow-up so that >I will have an offline version

resource.name: Generate list of clients who are due or overdue for vaccination
resource.description: *Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Generate list of clients who are due or overdue for vaccination: As a Health worker, I want to: >To export a list of clients for follow-up so that >Information can be sent to another health worker or system as appropriate

resource.name: Generate report
resource.description: *Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Generate report: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to produce and export reports in multiple formats (i.e. CSV, PDF) on demand so that >I can select the most appropriate format for my needs

resource.name: Generate report
resource.description: *Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Generate report: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to be able to print reports on demand so that >I can have a paper version of the report

resource.name: Generate report
resource.description: *Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Generate report: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to show me a preview of the report before printing so that >I can review before printing

resource.name: Generate report
resource.description: *Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Generate report: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to log the actions performed on the reports so that >An audit can be performed when needed

resource.name: Generate report
resource.description: *Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Generate report: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to offer the posibility of sending the generated report by email so that >I do not have to manually do that

resource.name: Generate report of duplicate vaccine events
resource.description: *Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Generate report of duplicate vaccine events: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to be able to generate a report of duplicate vaccine events including the resolutions so that >I can have a summary of the changes made

resource.name: Generate unique location identifier
resource.description: *Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Generate unique location identifier: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to generate a unique EIR identifier which may be linked to national ID or health ID so that >The vaccination location will have an unique identifier in the EIR system

resource.name: Generate verifiable digital certificate
resource.description: *Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Generate verifiable digital certificate: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to apply an authorised digital signature when necessary and appropriate so that >The identity of the issuing authority can be validated

resource.name: Get needed stock
resource.description: *Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Get needed stock: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to allow me to print the stock order(s) to be fulfilled so that >I can use this as my pick up list, even when I am offline

resource.name: Identify groups of vaccination events for evaluation
resource.description: *Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Identify groups of vaccination events for evaluation: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to support a rules-based algorithm to evaluate duplicate events so that >Duplicates can be found by the system using pre-defined rules

resource.name: Identify groups of vaccination events for evaluation
resource.description: *Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Identify groups of vaccination events for evaluation: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to automatically flag event records as possible duplicates by marking them as pending for review so that >The health worker or EIR staff is informed and aware of pending review

resource.name: Identify groups of vaccination events for evaluation
resource.description: *Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Identify groups of vaccination events for evaluation: As a EIR staff, I want to: >to be able to modify the business rules used for identifying vaccination events duplicates so that >The de-duplication process can be optimized

resource.name: Identify groups of vaccination events for evaluation
resource.description: *Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Identify groups of vaccination events for evaluation: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to prompt the user that a new vaccination event might already exist so that >The user can decide if it is a duplicate and if so not save it

resource.name: Identify groups of vaccination events for evaluation
resource.description: *Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Identify groups of vaccination events for evaluation: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to generate automatically a list of possible duplicated vaccination events so that >The review process is optimized

resource.name: Include an administrable content management system

*Category*: Maintainability
Include an administrable content management system

resource.name: Link with insurance systems to verify eligibility and submit claims
resource.description:
*Category*: Interoperability
Link with insurance systems to verify eligibility and submit claims

resource.name: LM.IMMZ.FXNREQ.001.A
resource.description: *Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Obtain vaccination location information: As a Electronic immunization registry (EIR) staff, I want to: >The EIR system to be able to communicate with other systems (such as a national health management information system [HMIS] and Expanded Programme on Immunization [EPI]) to obtain vaccination locations information and other necessary information so that >I will know about new vaccination locations and be informed about any updated information

resource.name: LM.IMMZ.FXNREQ.002.A
resource.description: *Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Validate against national master facility list: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to interface with National Master Facility List (NMFL) database to validate the EIR master list of vaccination locations so that >I can ensure the lists are synchronized

resource.name: LM.IMMZ.FXNREQ.003.A
resource.description: *Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Validate against national master facility list: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to flag any vaccination location registered in the EIR that is not on the NMFL so that >I can identify vaccination locations that need further investigation

resource.name: LM.IMMZ.FXNREQ.004.A
resource.description: *Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Validate against national master facility list: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to be able to link a vaccination locations NMFL identification (ID) with the corresponding EIR identifier so that >There will be a common understanding of what vaccination location is being referenced

resource.name: LM.IMMZ.FXNREQ.005.A

resource.name: LM.IMMZ.FXNREQ.008.A

resource.name: LM.IMMZ.FXNREQ.010.A

resource.name: LM.IMMZ.FXNREQ.011.A

resource.name: LM.IMMZ.FXNREQ.013.A
resource.description: *Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Request additional information: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to notify me of incomplete mandatory fields so that >I can ensure all necessary data is entered

resource.name: LM.IMMZ.FXNREQ.014.A
resource.description: *Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Request additional information: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to support the process of sending a request for information so that >I will not have to transcribe the request and send it manually

resource.name: LM.IMMZ.FXNREQ.015.A
resource.description: *Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Generate unique location identifier: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to generate a unique EIR identifier which may be linked to national ID or health ID so that >The vaccination location will have an unique identifier in the EIR system

resource.name: LM.IMMZ.FXNREQ.016.A
resource.description: *Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Send vaccination location registration notification: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to send EIR registration notification with EIR identifer to other systems so that >Other systems will be informed of the new vaccination location

resource.name: LM.IMMZ.FXNREQ.017.A
resource.description: *Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Send vaccination location registration notification: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to include instructions on how to use EIR identifier so that >Other systems will know how to interact with the EIR

resource.name: LM.IMMZ.FXNREQ.018.B
resource.description: *Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Review past vaccination records to estimate vaccines needed: As a Health worker, I want to: >To identify, by checking the information in the system, all clients that are due (or overdue) for vaccination by the next immunization session date so that >I can plan my immunization session

resource.name: LM.IMMZ.FXNREQ.019.B
resource.description: *Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Review past vaccination records to estimate vaccines needed: As a Health worker, I want to: >To sort the list of needed vaccines by antigen so that >I know how much of each vaccine is needed

resource.name: LM.IMMZ.FXNREQ.020.B
resource.description: *Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Review past vaccination records to estimate vaccines needed: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to provide range estimates for needed vaccines based on historical data (high and low ranges) so that >I can know how much vaccine has typically been used and adjust my specific list accordingly

resource.name: LM.IMMZ.FXNREQ.021.B
resource.description: *Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Record details on planning sheet: As a Health worker, I want to: >To print the list of necessary antigens and accessories (e.g. syringes, wipes) based on projected need so that >I can make sure I have an offline list of all the things I need for my immunization session

resource.name: LM.IMMZ.FXNREQ.022.B

resource.description: *Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Get needed stock: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to allow me to print the stock order(s) to be fulfilled so that >I can use this as my pick up list, even when I am offline

resource.name: LM.IMMZ.FXNREQ.032.B
resource.description: *Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Record stock taken: As a Health worker, I want to: >To record stock removed from cold storage and taken to immunization session so that >The count for the cold storage will be accurate, and the immunization session stock will be accounted for

resource.name: LM.IMMZ.FXNREQ.033.B
resource.description: *Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Record stock taken: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to maintain a tally of stock available at each location (e.g. stock available in the cold fridge at vaccination location, stock that is out for immunization session) so that >I can see where all stock is physically located in real time

resource.name: LM.IMMZ.FXNREQ.034.B

resource.description: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >To search for a client using at least two identifying information so that >I improve my chances of finding a match and distinguishing between similar records

resource.description: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >To search for the client record given some demographic information so that >I can find the client record if I do not have the unique ID

resource.name: LM.IMMZ.FXNREQ.037.C

resource.description: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The search to match on partial information (such as partial birthdates) so that >I have a better chance of finding a match

resource.name: LM.IMMZ.FXNREQ.039.C
resource.description: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to allow search parameters configuration: mandatory fields, when partial information is acceptable, etc. so that >A search can be optimized without compromising confidentiality

resource.description: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >To search with wild cards (using a symbol to replace one or more characters) so that >I can find something without knowing the exact spelling

resource.description: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >the system to identify any records that may have been imported from another system so that >I can verify the quality of imported data

resource.description: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to prompt a search for the client (check if it is already in the system) prior to starting a new record so that >Duplicates are prevented

resource.description: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to retrieve and display, as a search result, a specific set of data (demographic information/photo/unique ID, etc. ) so that >I can select the correct record

resource.description: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to extend the search to external systems (such as a birth registry or a scheduling system) so that >Duplicates of client record are prevented

resource.description: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >To enter additional search criteria if there are multiple possible matches so that >My list of matches is shorter and easier to review

resource.description: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Create client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to enforce a minimal required data set for new registrations so that >Sufficient data is entered to be able to identify the client

resource.description: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Validate client details: As a Health worker, I want to: >To select the place of birth from a standardized list of locations so that >Entry errors are prevented

resource.description: *Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Update record to document reason/lost follow-up: As a Health worker, I want to: >To record reason vaccine was missed so that >This information can be used for planning and reporting purposes

resource.name: Update record to document reason/lost follow-up
resource.description: *Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Update record to document reason/lost follow-up: As a Health worker, I want to: >To update client information such as including change of address (moved permanently or temporarily) so that >To facilitate the client being contacted or being removed from a immunization sessions list

resource.name: Update record to document reason/lost follow-up
resource.description: *Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Update record to document reason/lost follow-up: As a Health worker, I want to: >To flag when there is a change of address and a new client has been added to another catchment area so that >The client will appear on the correct list for follow up

resource.name: Update record to document reason/lost follow-up
resource.description: *Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Update record to document reason/lost follow-up: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to indicate if a client is inactive, identified as either permanently or temporarily, with a reason (e.g. death, moved, refuses vaccine) so that >No further follow up will be done, and they will not appear as defaulters

resource.name: Update record to document reason/lost follow-up
resource.description: *Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Update record to document reason/lost follow-up: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to set a specific inactivity time frame for temporarily inactive clients (e.g. temporarily lost residence, crop harvest season) so that >I can distinguish between those who may require follow up at a specific time in future versus those which are inactive for a indeterminate period of time

resource.name: Update record to document reason/lost follow-up
resource.description: *Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Update record to document reason/lost follow-up: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to generate a report of clients who are inactive and disaggregate by the reason they are inactive so that >It can be used for reporting and planning

resource.name: Update vaccination event records
resource.description: *Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Update vaccination event records: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to support an audit trail when event records are merged so that >Accountability can be maintained

resource.name: Update vaccination event records
resource.description: *Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Update vaccination event records: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to be able to provide history of merged event records so that >I can double check if the merge was done appropriately

resource.name: Update/add new vaccination location
resource.description: *Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Update/add new vaccination location: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to allow manual insertion of a new vaccination location not present in the NMFL in the EIR master list so that >I can add and use vaccination locations that are not yet in NMFL or other interconnected systems

resource.name: Update/add new vaccination location
resource.description: *Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Update/add new vaccination location: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to send a notification to the NMFL about a new vaccination location added to EIR so that >The NMFL can be aware of any potentially new vaccination locations

resource.name: Update/add new vaccination location
resource.description: *Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Update/add new vaccination location: As a EIR staff, I want to: >To be able to include vaccination locations that may not be physical permanent facilities (such as temporary or pop-up clinics) so that >We will have the flexibility to accommodate temporary vaccination locations

resource.name: Update/add new vaccination location
resource.description: *Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Update/add new vaccination location: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to allow conversion of a temporary vaccination location to a permanent vaccination location so that >The data from the temporary vaccination location is not lost

resource.description: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Validate client details: As a Health worker, I want to: >The ability to generate a barcode label to affix to the paper record so that >The record can easily be uniquely identified by scanning the ID

resource.name: Validate client details
resource.description: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Validate client details: As a Health worker, I want to: >The ability to associate a unique ID generated by another authority (local or global) to the record so that >The record can be more easily shared or identified with other appropriate systems

resource.name: Validate client details
resource.description: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Validate client details: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to display the information of the selected record so that >I can validate and update (if needed) client information

resource.name: Validate client details
resource.description: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Validate client details: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to modify appropriate client data as needed so that >the record contains up to date information

resource.name: Validate client details
resource.description: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Validate client details: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to track that I have changed an existing record so that >accountability for data modification is ensured
